article_title: N.J. Obamacare expert answers your questions about open enrollment
article_text:
As she did earlier this year, Niyonu Boateng, project director of the ACA Navigator Program at the Urban League of Hudson County — along with her members of her staff — joined us today to answer specific questions about Obamacare open enrollment.

We've covered some of the basic information about the "open enrollment" period for getting health insurance via the Affordable Care Act.



Obamacare FAQ

We know many people have situations that are a bit more complicated. We hope you find answers to many of your questions in our FAQ and in today's live chat. We'll continue to do these live Q&As periodically to help you navigate through this fledgling law.

Kathleen O'Brien may be reached at kobrien@njadvancemedia.com, or at (732) 902-4557. Follow her on Twitter @OBrienLedger. Find NJ.com on Facebook.

We hope you find answers to many of your questions in our FAQ and in today's live chat.
We've covered some of the basic information about the "open enrollment" period for getting health insurance via the Affordable Care Act.
As she did earlier this year, Niyonu Boateng, project director of the ACA Navigator Program at the Urban League of Hudson County — along with her members of her staff — joined us today to answer specific questions about Obamacare open enrollment.

We'll continue to do these live Q&As periodically to help you navigate through this fledgling law.
